programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o pvsdisp.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
instr 1 asig inch 1 ;a1 soundin "input.wav" ;select a soundifle fsig pvsanal asig, 1024,256, 1024, 1 pvsdisp fsig
endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore>
i 1 0 30 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
